Optein™

Highly Versatile, Lightly Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein
  • Food
  • Bakery Products
  • Breads, Rolls, Bagels, Biscuits and Muffins
  • Optein™

Optein™ is a highly versatile, lightly hydrolyzed wheat protein that provides a variety of nutritional, functional and sensory benefits in a range of food and beverage product applications.

A clinical study shows Optein’s effectiveness in aiding muscle recovery after exercise, which proves its superior functionality in nutritional and protein drink powder mixes, sports beverages, smoothies, and protein, energy and meal replacement bars.

Among the more unique attributes of Optein is that it provides approximately double the glutamine content of soy and whey proteins. Glutamine is reported to be effective in the prevention of fatigue and over-training syndrome among active athletes, rapid recovery of critically-ill patients, and replacement of the body’s glycogen.

As an ingredient for bakery applications, Optein can reduce mixing time while also increasing extensibility, which makes it a suitable replacement for animal-based L-cysteine. Also, because it is a wheat protein, it has a natural fit with flour-based dough systems and bakery mixes, as well as flour-based batters and breadings.

Furthermore, for consumers who adhere to strict vegetarian diets, Optein offers a logical solution for replacing whey protein, which is derived from animal milk.

Other qualities of Optein include its non-bitter flavor profile, especially compared to soy, its neutral pH level, its ability to increase protein contents in end product formulations and the fact that it is easily soluble in water and other liquids.

Please view partial data from an excersie study on Optein™.

  • Benefits
  • Increases protein
  • Possesses neutral pH
  • Easily soluble in water
  • Contains high glutamine content
  • Aids in muscle recovery
  • Has non-bitter flavor profile
  • Reduces dough mixing time
  • Increases dough extensibility
  • Cereals and Snacks
